Description copied from interface: IAeEventHandler
Event handler callback for engine events, such as process creation and termination.

Specified by:
engineEventHandler in interface IAeEventHandler
Parameters:
aContextId - the context id used to locate the callback
aProcessId - the id of the process affected
aEventType - the event type
aProcessName - the name of the process
aTimestamp - the event's timestamp
Returns:
true return indicates to suspend the associated process.

Description copied from interface: IAeEventHandler
Event handler callback for process events, such as process state and info.

Specified by:
processEventHandler in interface IAeEventHandler
Parameters:
aContextId - the context id used to locate the callback
aProcessId - the id of the process affected
aPath - path of node affected by the event
aEventType - the event type
aFaultName - an optional fault name if fault event
aText - optional text
aName - The process' QName.
aTimestamp - the event's timestamp
Returns:
True if the process needs to be suspended, False otherwise

java.rmi.RemoteException
